author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we’re checking out the Z2-powered Lenovo Legion Go 2 — the more affordable version of Lenovo’s powerful handheld gaming PC. It’s $250 cheaper than the Z2 Extreme, but still packs serious performance with 8 cores / 16 threads Zen 4 architecture, a 12-CU RDNA3 GPU, and that beautiful 8.8-inch 144 Hz OLED VRR display — still the best screen in any handheld gaming device.
We’ll walk through the specs, design, Legion Space interface, FPS mode, and real-world gaming performance in titles like Cyberpunk 2077, Elden Ring, Forza Horizon 5, and Borderlands 4 — all tested directly on the Z2 variant.
This isn’t a review — just a deep look at how well the “non-Extreme” Z2 model performs and whether it’s worth saving the $250 compared to the flagship version. #LegionGo2 #HandheldGaming #ETAPRIME #Lenovo #RyzenZ2

Buy The Legion Go 2 from Lenovo: https://howl.link/sqbolwnvo7pw9
Buy The Legion Go 2 from Best Buy: https://bestbuycreators.7tiv.net/GK9bAE

title: I Tested the Cheaper Legion Go 2… and It’s Shockingly Fast!
